entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 10:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening except flurries over higher terrain this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening except gusting to 60 over southern sections late this evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
